org.fujion.component

Class Columns

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.component.BaseComponent
      • org.fujion.component.BaseUIComponent
        • org.fujion.component.Columns
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDisable, IElementIdentifier

    @Component(tag="columns",
           widgetModule="fujion-grid",
           widgetClass="Columns",
           parentTag="grid",
           childTag=@Component.ChildTag(value="column"),
           description="A container for a grid\'s columns.")
public class Columns
extends BaseUIComponent
    Component serving as a container for a grid's columns.
